stimulusHtml: What is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int[][] arr = {{1, 2, 3}, 
               {4, 5, 6}, 
               {7, 8, 9}, 
               {3, 2, 1}}; 
 
for (int j = 0; j < arr.length; j++) 
{ 
   for (int k = j; k < arr[0].length; k++) 
   { 
      System.out.print(arr[j][k] + " "); 
   } 
   System.out.println(); 
}
